title: Truckers and protesters against Covid-19 mandates block a border crossing. Others tried to take meals away from the homeless in Ottawa, shelter says - CNN
content:
1. Truckers and protesters against Covid-19 mandates block a border crossing. Others tried to take meals away from the homeless in Ottawa, shelter says  CNN
  2. 'Canadians were shocked...and disgusted': Justin Trudeau says we 'won't give in' to individuals who are violent, 'spew hatred' in Ottawa  Yahoo News
  3. Washington Post, MSNBC trash Canadian 'Freedom Convoy' truckers: 'It's a cult'  Fox News
  4. Canadian truckers have every right to protest – which doesn’t stop them being wrong about the vaccine mandate  The Independent
  5. Police investigate 'illegal' acts at Canadian anti-vaccine mandate rallies  NBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Criminal investigations are underway after the "desecration" of monuments during the protests. And despite the travel and trade blockages, police say some protesters plan to stay for days.
